name: Duelist's Plume
description: Upon use, increases all allies' ATK by 40% for the next battle. Upon entering battle, randomly increases the chance for 1 character to be attacked by enemies greatly.
story:
Wearing a hat adorned with vibrant feathers might be too flamboyant for everyday wear, but some individuals enjoy being the center of attention, even if only for a moment.

"All eyes, on me!"
